1.title: Simple Assault
1.description: When a person intentionally or knowingly causes physical contact with another (without a weapon)

1.title: Assault
1.description: If a person intentionally or knowingly causes injury to another (without a weapon)

1.title: Assault with a Deadly Weapon
1.description: When a person intentionally, knowingly, or recklessly causes bodily injury to another person AND either causes serious bodily injury or uses or exhibits a deadly weapon

1.title: Involuntary Manslaughter
1.description: When a person unintentionally and recklessly causes the death of another

1.title: Vehicular Manslaughter
1.description: When a person unintentionally and recklessly causes the death of anther with a vehicle

1.title: Attempted Murder of a Civilian
1.description: When a non-government person intentionally attacks another with the intent to kill

1.title: Second Degree Murder
1.description: Any intentional killing that is not premeditated or planned. A situation in which the killer intends only to inflict serious bodily harm.

1.title: Accessory to Second Degree Murder
1.description: Being present and or participating in the act of parent charge

1.title: First Degree Murder
1.description: Any intentional killing that is willful and premeditated with malice.

1.title: Accessory to First Degree Murder
1.description: Being present and or participating in the act of parent charge

1.title: Murder of a Public Servant or Peace Officer
1.description: Any intentional killing that is done to a government employee

1.title: Attempted Murder of a Public Servant or Peace Officer
1.description: Any attacks that are done to a government employee with the intent to cause death

1.title: Accessory to the Murder of a Public Servant or Peace Officer
1.description: Being present and or participating in the act of parent charge

1.title: Unlawful Imprisonment
1.description: The act of taking another against their will and holding them for an extended period of time

1.title: Kidnapping
1.description: The act of taking another against their will for a short period of time

1.title: Accessory to Kidnapping
1.description: Being present and or participating in the act of parent charge

1.title: Attempted Kidnapping
1.description: The act of trying to take someone against their will

1.title: Hostage Taking
1.description: The act of taking another against their will for personal gain

1.title: Accessory to Hostage Taking
1.description: Being present and or participating in the act of parent charge

1.title: Unlawful Imprisonment of a Public Servant or Peace Officer.
1.description: The act of taking a government employee against their will for an extended period of time

1.title: Criminal Threats
1.description: The act of stating the intent to commit a crime against another

1.title: Reckless Endangerment
1.description: The act of disregarding safety of another which may place another in danger of death or bodily injury

1.title: Gang Related Shooting
1.description: The act in which a firearm is discharged in relation to gang activity

1.title: Cannibalism
1.description: The act in which a persons consumes the flesh of another willingly

1.title: Torture
1.description: The act of causing harm to another to extract informaion and or for self enjoyment

1.title: LockPicking a Car
1.description: The act of using tools or methods to pick the lock of a vehicle without authorization.

2.title: Petty Theft
2.description: The theft of property below $50 amount

2.title: Grand Theft Auto A
2.description: The act of stealing a vehicle that belongs to someone else without permission

2.title: Grand Theft Auto B
2.description: The act of stealing a vehicle that belongs to someone else without permission while armed

2.title: Carjacking
2.description: The act of someone forcefully taking a vehicle from its occupants

2.title: Burglary
2.description: The act of entering into a building illegally with intent to commit a crime, especially theft.

2.title: Robbery
2.description: The action of taking property unlawfully from a person or place by force or threat of force.

2.title: Accessory to Robbery
2.description: Being present and or participating in the act of parent charge

2.title: Attempted Robbery
2.description: The action of attempting property unlawfully from a person or place by force or threat of force.

2.title: Armed Robbery
2.description: The action of taking property unlawfully from a person or place by force or threat of force while armed.

2.title: Accessory to Armed Robbery
2.description: Being present and or participating in the act of parent charge

2.title: Attempted Armed Robbery
2.description: The action of attempting property unlawfully from a person or place by force or threat of force while armed.

2.title: Grand Larceny
2.description: Theft of personal property having a value above a legally specified amount.

2.title: Leaving Without Paying
2.description: The act of leaving an establishment without paying for provided service

2.title: Possession of Nonlegal Currency
2.description: Being in possession of stolen currency

2.title: Possession of Government-Issued Items
2.description: Being in possession of Items only acquireable by government employees

2.title: Possession of Items Used in the Commission of a Crime
2.description: Being in possession of Items that were previously used to commit crimes

2.title: Sale of Items Used in the Commission of a Crime
2.description: The act of selling items that were previously used to commit crimes

2.title: Theft of an Aircraft
2.description: The act of stealing an aircraft

3.title: Impersonating
3.description: The action of falsely identifying as another person to deceive

3.title: Impersonating a Peace Officer or Public Servant
3.description: The action of falsely identifying as a government employee to deceive

3.title: Impersonating a Judge
3.description: The action of falsely identifying as a Judge to deceive

3.title: Possession of Stolen Identification
3.description: To have another persons Identification without consent

3.title: Possession of Stolen Government Identification
3.description: To have the identification of a government employee without consent

3.title: Extortion
3.description: To threaten or cause harm to a person or property for financial gain

3.title: Fraud
3.description: To deceive another for financial gain

3.title: Forgery
3.description: To falsify legal documentation for personal gain

3.title: Money Laundering
3.description: The processing stolen money for legal currency

4.title: Trespassing
4.description: For a person to be within the bounds of a location of which they are not legally allowed

4.title: Felony Trespassing
4.description: For a person to have repeatedly entered the bounds of a location of which they are knowingly not legally allowed

4.title: Arson
4.description: The use if fire and accelerants to will and maliciously destroy, harm or cause death to a person or property

4.title: Vandalism of Government Property
4.description: The willful destruction of government property

4.title: Littering
4.description: The willful discard of refuse into to open and not in designated bin

5.title: Bribery of a Government Official
5.description: the use of money, favors and or property to gain favor with a government official

5.title: Anti-Mask Law
5.description: Wearing a mask in a prohibited zone

5.title: Possession of Contraband in a Government Facility
5.description: Being in possession of items that are illegal while within a government building

5.title: Criminal Possession of Stolen Property
5.description: Being in possession of items stolen knowingly or not

5.title: Escaping
5.description: The action of willful and knowingly leaving custody while legally being arrest, detained or in jail

5.title: Jailbreak
5.description: The action of leaving state custody from a state or county detention facility

5.title: Accessory to Jailbreak
5.description: Being present and or participating in the act of parent charge

5.title: Attempted Jailbreak
5.description: The willful and intentional attempted escape from a state or county detention facility

5.title: Perjury
5.description: The action of stating falsities while legally bound to speak the truth

5.title: Violation of a Restraining Order
5.description: The willful and knowing infringement upon court ordered protective documentation

5.title: Embezzlement
5.description: The willful and knowingly movement of funds from non personal bank accounts to personal bank accounts for personal gain

5.title: Unlawful Practice
5.description: The action of performing a service without proper legal licensing and approval

5.title: Misuse of Emergency Systems
5.description: Use of government emergency equipment for its non-intended purpose

5.title: Conspiracy
5.description: The act of planning a crime but not yet commiting the crime

5.title: Violating a Court Order
5.description: The infringement of court ordered documentation

5.title: Failure to Appear
5.description: When someone who is legally bound to appear in court does not do so

5.title: Contempt of Court
5.description: The disruption of court proceedings in a courtroom while it is in session (judicial decision)

5.title: Resisting Arrest
5.description: The act of not allowing peace officers to take you into custody willingly

6.title: Disobeying a Peace Officer
6.description: The willful disregard of a lawful order

6.title: Disorderly Conduct
6.description: Acting in a manner that creates a hazardous or physically offensive condition by any act which serves no legitimate purpose of the actor.

6.title: Disturbing the Peace
6.description: Action in a manner that causes unrest and disrupts public order

6.title: False Reporting
6.description: The act of reporting a crime that did not happen

6.title: Harassment
6.description: The repeated disruption or verbal attacks of another person

6.title: Misdemeanor Obstruction of Justice
6.description: Acting in a way that hinders the process of Justice or lawful investigations

6.title: Felony Obstruction of Justice
6.description: Acting in a way that hinders the process of Justice or lawful investigations while using violence

6.title: Inciting a Riot
6.description: Causing civil unrest in a manner to incite a group to cause harm to people or property

6.title: Loitering on Government Properties
6.description: When someone is present in a government proper for an extended period of time

6.title: Tampering
6.description: When someone willfully, knowingly and indirectly interfering with key points of a lawful investigation

6.title: Vehicle Tampering
6.description: The willful and knowing interference the normal function of a vehicle

6.title: Evidence Tampering
6.description: The willful and knowing interference with evidence from a lawful investigation

6.title: Witness Tampering
6.description: The willful and knowing coaching or coercing of a witness in a lawful investigation

6.title: Failure to Provide Identification
6.description: The act of not presenting identification when lawfully required to do so

6.title: Vigilantism
6.description: The act of engaging in enforcing the law with legal authority to do so

6.title: Unlawful Assembly
6.description: when a large group gathers in a location that requires prior approval to do so

6.title: Government Corruption
6.description: The act of using political position and power for self gain

6.title: Stalking
6.description: When one person monitors another without their consent

6.title: Aiding and Abetting
6.description: To assist someone in committing or to encourage someone to commit a crime

6.title: Harboring a Fugitive
6.description: When someone willingly hides another who is wanted by the authorities

7.title: Misdemeanor Possession of Marijuana
7.description: The possession of a quantity of marijuana in the amount of less the 4 blunts

7.title: Felony manufacturing of Marijuana
7.description: The possession of a quantity of marijuana that is from manufacturing

7.title: Cultivation of Marijuana A
7.description: The possession of 4 or less marijuana plants

7.title: Cultivation of Marijuana B
7.description: The possession of 5 or more marijuana plants

7.title: Possession of Marijuana with Intent to Distribute
7.description: The possession of a quantity of Marijuana for distribution

7.description: The possession of a quantity of shrooms that is from manufacturing

7.description: The possession of lean in a small quantity usually for personal use

7.description: The possession of a quantity of lean for distribution

7.title: Sale of a controlled substance
7.description: The sale of a substance that is controlled by law

7.title: Drug Trafficking
7.description: The large scale movement of illegal drugs

7.title: Desecration of a Human Corpse
7.description: When someone harms, disturbs or destroys the remains of another person

7.title: Public Intoxication
7.description: When someone is intoxicated above legal limit in public

7.title: Public Indecency
7.description: The act of someone exposing themself in a way that infringes in public morals

8.title: Criminal Possession of Weapon Class A
8.description: Possession of a Class A firearm without licensing

8.title: Criminal Possession of Weapon Class B
8.description: Possession of a Class B firearm without licensing

8.description: Possession of a Class C firearm without licensing

8.description: Possession of a Class D firearm without licensing

8.description: The act of selling a Class A firearm without licensing

8.description: The act of selling a Class B firearm without licensing

8.description: The act of selling a Class C firearm without licensing

8.title: Criminal Use of Weapon
8.description: Use of a weapon while in commission of a crime

8.title: Possession of Illegal Firearm Modifications
8.description: Being in possession of firearm modifications unlawfully

8.title: Weapon Trafficking
8.description: The transportation of a large amount of weapons for one point to another

8.title: Brandishing a Weapon
8.description: The act of making a firearm purposely visible

8.title: Insurrection
8.description: Attempting to overthrow the government with violence

8.title: Flying into Restricted Airspace
8.description: Piloting and aircraft into airspace that is governmentally controlled

8.title: Jaywalking
8.description: crossing a roadway in a manner that is hazardous to motor vehicles

8.title: Criminal Use of Explosives
8.description: Use of explosives to committing a crime

9.title: Driving While Intoxicated
9.description: Operating a motor vehicle while impaired by alcohol

9.title: Evading
9.description: Hiding or running from lawful detainment

9.title: Reckless Evading
9.description: Recklessly disregarding safety and Hiding or running from lawful detainment while

9.title: Failure to Yield to Emergency Vehicle
9.description: Not giving way to emergency vehicles

9.title: Failure to Obey Traffic Control Device
9.description: Not following the safety devices of the roadway

9.title: Nonfunctional Vehicle
9.description: Having a vehicle that is no longer functional in the roadway

9.title: Negligent Driving
9.description: Driving in a manner as to unknowingly disregard safety

9.title: Reckless Driving
9.description: Driving in a manner as to knowingly disregard safety

9.title: Third Degree Speeding
9.description: Speeding 15 over the limit

9.title: Second Degree Speeding
9.description: Speeding 35 over the limit

9.title: First Degree Speeding
9.description: Speeding 50 over the limit

9.title: Unlicensed Operation of Vehicle
9.description: The operation of a motor vehicle without proper licensing

9.title: Illegal U-Turn
9.description: Performing a u-turn where it is prohibited

9.title: Illegal Passing
9.description: Passing other motor vehicles in a prohibited manner

9.title: Failure to Maintain Lane
9.description: Not staying in the correct lane with a motor vehicle

9.title: Illegal Turn
9.description: Performing a turn where it is prohibited

9.title: Failure to Stop
9.description: Not stopping for a lawful stop or traffic device

9.title: Unauthorized Parking
9.description: Parking a vehicle in a location that requires approval with any

9.title: Hit and Run
9.description: Striking another person or vehicle and fleeing the location

9.title: Driving without Headlights or Signals
9.description: Operating a vehicle with no functional lights

9.title: Street Racing
9.description: Operating motorvehicles in a contest

9.title: Piloting without Proper Licensing
9.description: Failure to be in possession of valid licensing when operating an aircraft

9.title: Unlawful Use of a Motor Vehicle
9.description: The use of a motor vehicle without a lawful reason

10.title: Hunting in Restricted Areas
10.description: Harvesting game in areas where it is prohibited to do so

10.title: Animal Cruelty
10.description: The act of abusing an animal knowingly or not

10.title: Hunting with a Non-Hunting Weapon
10.description: To use a weapon not lawfully stated or manufactured to be used for the harvesting of wild game

10.title: Hunting outside of hunting hours
10.description: Harvesting animals outside of specified time to do so

10.title: Overhunting
10.description: Taking more than legally specified amount of game

10.title: Poaching
10.description: Harvesting an animal that is listed as legally non-harvestable
